Title: Son Goku vs Freeza! The Curtain Opens on the Super Decisive Battle!
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Goku and Frieza go head to head in a vicious slugfest that threatens to destroy the planet of Namek. Krillin and Gohan are amazed by the brutality of the battle, but Piccolo believes two warriors are just warming up!
